details.songOfResponse: When I Survey the Wondrous Cross #144

list: August memory verse â€“ 1 John 3:2 BSB: Beloved, we are now children of God, and what we will be has not yet been revealed. We know that when Christ appears, we will be like Him, for we will see Him as He is.
We are accepting donations for the Christmas Shoeboxes. The goal is to send 150.
Please see Ryan if you would like to add the church Google calendar to your device.

September 7: Quarterly business meeting following the evening service.
